00012      * alarm flags 
00013      */
00014 #define SA_REPEAT 0x01          /* keep repeating every X seconds */
00015 #define SA_FIRED 0x10          /* Being processed in run_alarms */
00016 
00017     struct snmp_alarm {
00018         struct timeval  t;

00025         struct snmp_alarm *next;
00026     };
